author: waredjeb
body:
This PR adds the new dEdX weights for the V19 HGCAL Geometry. 


Should be tested on a D120 workflow:
Maybe:
 `34234.0 TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_Run4D120PU_GenSimHLBeamSpot14+DigiTriggerPU_Run4D120PU+RecoGlobalPU_Run4D120PU+HARVESTGlobalPU_Run4D120PU` ?

@pfs @felicepantaleo
title: Introduce new dEdX weights V19 HGCAL Geometry
